topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a0cd8c63687259f6080000#post_53a0cd8c63687259f6080000


there is 2 reasons why they do it.

1. they make fun of today´s rap by getting the 2 most ignorant memebrs (taco bennet and jasper dolphin) to rap about bitches and money. (we got bitches, swag me out, tina, lisa)

2. they just love to piss people off, and what better way to doit than misoginy, specially in this day and age.

i personally dont like those 2 songs, but i love to quote them to surprise people.

tyler stopped doing that shit in his new album wolf, its mostly filled with more real love songs, like party isnt over/campfire/bimmer.

"You remind me of my bimmer
A lot of trunk space, the perfect two seater
You got a lot of drive I’m trying to keep up
But it's not a lot of miles on ya meter
You remind me of my bimmer, smash
You remind me of my bimmer"

"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a0d04d6368720190470000#post_53a0d04d6368720190470000


he matured once he had to deal with fame and knew his music could change the life of people (he said he has received emails from kids telling him they were about to kill themselves till they heard his music, cause they were bastards like him) 

if you see him in his 2011 interviews he acts a tad too inmature, if you watch his interviews now, like with larry king you could sense he although behaves somehwat like a teenager, he is more mature, more direct, talking profesionally and stuff.

topics.body:
"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a0d04d6368720190470000#post_53a0d04d6368720190470000


there is also a 3rd possible reason why he made those songs after reading the conspiracy theory behin his albums.

it seems that in wolf the character "wolf", meet sthe love of his life "salem", but because of a fight with his boyfriend "sam", he gets taken away and without salem he either 1) feels like every other woman is a whore or 2)he only has sex with whores thinking it will fill his void for love.

he also has 2 love songs in goblin called her and analog, which dont have anything about "sluts", or "bitch suck my dick", or necrophilia, or rape.

thats just what i think tho, he may just be inmature.

topics.body:
So for an RP I went and wrote an almost 5,000 word post that peaks at a flashback to the post's relevant character witnessing some chick getting raped, then lowering off and ending with the psychiatrist he's talking to telling a story about how he watched a young girl die of shrapnel wounds.

All in an RP where people try to fluff themselves up to have the biggest guns. Meanwhile I'm talking about rape and PTSD.
